tasks.task: Examine the impact of winter weather on livestock and the strategies farmers use.
subtasks: Research weather forecasts for livestock survival.
Understand the nutritional needs of animals during cold weather.
Identify physical barriers to wind chill, such as tree rows.
Recognize the role of the National Weather Service in providing cold weather advisories.

tasks.task: Assess the importance of wind chill on livestock.
subtasks: Identify the temperature range where dry animals have no increased energy needs.
Determine additional feed or supplements required to meet energy demands.
Observe the use of natural windbreaks, like tree rows, to protect livestock.
